actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring locomotives to be equipped with bulletproof glass.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring that the glass of all exposed windows of locomotives be bulletproof.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring locomotives to be equipped with bulletproof glass.
